SummaryEnglish: An extraterrestrial ice entity named  arrives on Earth in an attempt to freeze it, but a fragment of her comet has been lost and she is unable to proceed without it. She has her henchwomen, the Snow Dancers, search for the missing fragment. In Tokyo, a young astronomer named  finds the fragment and keeps it in his observatory to study it further.
Aliases: Sailor Moon S: The Movie: Hearts in Ice
Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon S: The Movie
Gekijō-ban Bishōjo Senshi Sērā Mūn Sūpā
